translations.text: When the sky bursts open,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Itha assamao inshaqqat
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: obeying its Lord as it must,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waathinat lirabbiha wahuqqat
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and when the earth is flattened out,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha al-ardu muddat
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and ejects ˹all˺ its contents<sup foot_note=77607>1</sup> and becomes empty,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waalqat ma feeha watakhallat
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: obeying its Lord as it must, ˹surely you will all be judged˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waathinat lirabbiha wahuqqat
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَـٰقِيهِ

translations.text: O humanity! Indeed, you are labouring restlessly towards your Lord, and will ˹eventually˺ meet the consequences.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya ayyuha al-insanuinnaka kadihun ila rabbika kadhanfamulaqeeh
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: As for those who are given their record in their right hand,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faama man ootiya kitabahubiyameenih
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: they will have an easy reckoning,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasawfa yuhasabu hisabanyaseera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and will return to their people joyfully.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayanqalibu ila ahlihi masroora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ

translations.text: And as for those who are given their record ˹in their left hand˺ from behind their backs,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waamma man ootiya kitabahu waraathahrih
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: they will cry for ˹instant˺ destruction,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasawfa yadAAoo thuboora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and will burn in the blazing Fire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayasla saAAeera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: For they used to be prideful among their people,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu kana fee ahlihi masroora
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: thinking they would never return ˹to Allah˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu thanna an lan yahoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًا

translations.text: Yes ˹they would˺! Surely their Lord has always been All-Seeing of them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bala inna rabbahu kana bihi baseera
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So, I do swear by the twilight!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fala oqsimu bishshafaq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And by the night and whatever it envelops!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallayli wama wasaq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And by the moon when it waxes full!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walqamari itha ittasaq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: You will certainly pass from one state to another.<sup foot_note=77608>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Latarkabunna tabaqan AAan tabaq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So what is the matter with them that they do not believe,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fama lahum la yu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩

translations.text: and when the Quran is recited to them, they do not bow down ˹in submission˺?<sup foot_note=77609>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha quri-a AAalayhimu alqur-anula yasjudoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: In fact, the disbelievers persist in denial.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bali allatheena kafaroo yukaththiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But Allah knows best whatever they hide.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallahu aAAlamu bimayooAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So give them good news of a painful punishment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabashshirhum biAAathabin aleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ

translations.text: But those who believe and do good will have a never-ending reward.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati lahum ajrun ghayrumamnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
